author: Saibot
name: Print AI Defeat Message
description: Prints the defeat message for Ai player 1 - 4 if they do not have a tower anymore.

author: Saibot
name: Default - 100 Waves
description: Spawns the default units, has AI for Roman

author: Saibot
name: Default - 100 Waves - no AI
description: Spawns the default units, has no AI

author: Saibot
name: Default - 100 Waves - Random AI
description: Spawns the default units, has the Random AI enabled

author: Saibot
name: Default - 100 Waves - with new AI
description: Testversion only. do not play. Spawns the default units, has map defined AI (with building queue)

author: Saibot
name: Default
description: Sword, Bow, Spear or Mana can be selected by the player,</br> spawning it at the players Base. Players can battle themselves without building.

author: Fearles
name: Defend The Oasis
description: This is a scripted three-player map created by Fearles. Your objective is to defend the large tower in the middle for 90 minutes against waves of enemies swarming the green lands of the Oasis from all directions. Venture into the desert to claim additional resources spawning in three special locations around you. Be quick though, enemies will send patrols there, and goods disappear 5 minutes after you receive the message from your scouts. With each wave, the enemies will grow stronger. Occasionally, they might also use unconventional methods of aggression. Be ready for everything!

author: Saibot
name: Hunt_The_Pope
description: A Player looses if they dont have a priest after minute 35. Once they have a priest BigTemples are crushed.

author: Saibot
name: No_Bows_No_AI
description: Effectively disables the use of bows by removing them from the map and changing production values to 0. Also disables AI

name: No_Bows_With_AI
description: Effectively disables the use of bows by removing them from the map and changing production values to 0. AI stays enabled

author: Lord Helmchen
name: Crush_Barracks_On_AI_Loose
description: it's main function is to delete the barracks of a player(AI) when it's defeated, as in its last tower has been captured
